alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 06 at 3:36PM AKST until February 08 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 9 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Sustained northerly winds at 15 to 20 mph will combine with temperatures dropping to -15F to -25F to support wind chill values of -40F to -50F. The coldest wind chills will occur with morning lows on both Monday and Tuesday.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
